subscribe.failure: Ooops... something went wrong with the subscribtion

unsubscribe.after: You have been unsubscribed from the mailing list
unsubscribe.failure-reason: Please try once more, and in case of the error contact our support

gift.redeem: Use this code to redeem your gift card
gift.title: Massage Therapy Card
gift.desc: Would you like to treat yourself or someone you know to a great massage or something from our gift shop? A gift card from Massage Therapy is the perfect gift for any holiday. Available in several different quantities to suit any budget, this is the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, special occasions or for employees.

booking.title: Book massage session
booking.register-benefits: By registering you will have full control to your account and bookings, you will receive discounts, special offers, gifts and more

payment-options.info: Please proceed with the payment by the bank requisites noted below, attach the payment receipt and click «Confirm booking» button.
payment-options.title: Payment options
payment-options.email-desc: Please enter your email for us to be able to send the confirmation to you:
payment-options.file-requirements: Max file size: 10 MB. Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG

auth.hasEmailConsent: Send me information about deals and services

register.title: Register
register.success: Confirmation email was sent to the address that you have entered

register.duplicate: User with this email is already registered

confirmEmail.thanks: Thank you for confirming the email
confirmEmail.after: Please log in using your credentials
